Task Description: Finalize traffic control plan with consultant

Task Description: Review traffic control plan with team

Notes: City dissects plan, forwards to police

Task Description: Coordinate with police on officer requirements
Form race course validation subcommittee
Validate race course for safety and accuracy
Notes: Ensure course is safe and accurate

Task Description: Confirm final route based on construction status
Notes: Coben Lodge construction may require adjustment via Third Line

Task Description: Arrange paid duty police
Notes: Based on police requirements from TCP

Task Description: Arrange banner placement (2 locations in Oakville)
Connect with Oakville Chamber of Commerce president
Setup traffic control equipment (Race Day)
Supervise traffic control (Race Day)

Task Description: 6:30 AM - Road closure begins (police)
8:00 AM - Kids race starts

9:30 AM - Roads begin reopening
10:00 AM - Ontario Street fully reopens
Athletics Ontario Certification NOT possible Year 1 - path width 6ft (requires 8ft)
